CustomField.description: This field is marked from apex code when an inbound email opens a case in salesforce and was sent to collections@redcross.org (the email address is subject to a change)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is marked from apex code when an inbound email opens a case in salesforce and was sent to collections@redcross.org (the email address is subject to a change)
CustomField.label: Collections Email
